div.p: As per the Texas Governor's order, Eden CISD will remain closed through May 4th. We will continue to provide meals as we are able and school work to our students.

br.p: Normal Office Hours: Monday – Friday, 8:00 am – 4:00 pm
Summer Office Hours: Monday – Thursday, 8:00 am – 4:00 pm

em.strong: Growing students into lifelong learners through a supportive team effort.

div.p: 113 West Bryan Street, P.O. Box 988, Eden, TX 76837 Phone: 325-869-4121 Fax: 325-869-5210
